::: {.section .js_darkmode__0 tool="mdnice编辑器" website="https://www.mdnice.com" style="font-size: 16px; color: black; padding-right: 10px; padding-left: 10px; line-height: 1.6; letter-spacing: 0px; word-break: break-word; overflow-wrap: break-word; text-align: left; font-family: \"PingFang SC\", \"Microsoft YaHei\", sans-serif; visibility: visible;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)" data-style="font-size: 16px; color: black; padding-right: 10px; padding-left: 10px; line-height: 1.6; letter-spacing: 0px; word-break: break-word; overflow-wrap: break-word; text-align: left; font-family: \"PingFang SC\", \"Microsoft YaHei\", sans-serif;"}
回归分析是一种预测性的建模技术，它研究的是因变量和自变量之间的关系。它能够表明自多个自变量对一个因变量的影响强度。这种技术通常用于预测分析、时间序列模型以及发现变量之间的因果关系。回归分析是一种通过建立模型来研 究变量之间相互关系的密切程度、结构状态及进行模型预测的有效工具，是建模和分析数据的重要工具。

回归算法源于统计学理论，它可能是机器学习算法中产生最早的算法之一，其在现实中的应用非常广泛，包括使用其他经济指标预测股票市场指数，根据喷射流的特征预测区域内的降水量，根据公司的广告花费预测总销售额，或者根据有机 物质中残留的碳-14的量来估计化石的年龄等等，只要一切基于特征预测连续型变量的需求，我们都使用回归技术。

![图片](./linear_model_files/640){.rich_pages}

## [多元线性回归基本原理]{style="display: inline-block; background: rgb(0, 128, 255); color: rgb(255, 255, 255); padding: 2px 10px 1px; border-top-right-radius: 3px; border-top-left-radius: 3px; margin-right: 3px; visibility: visible;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(255, 255, 255)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(255, 255, 255)" darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgb(0, 128, 255)" darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0, 128, 255)"}[ ]{.js_darkmode__1 style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: bottom; border-bottom: 31px solid rgb(239, 235, 233); border-right: 25px solid transparent; visibility: visible;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)" data-style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: bottom; border-bottom: 31px solid rgb(239, 235, 233); border-right: 25px solid transparent;"} {#多元线性回归基本原理 tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px; margin-bottom: 15px; font-weight: bold; border-bottom: 3px solid rgb(0, 128, 255); font-size: 1.1em; visibility: visible;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

### 回归方程 {#回归方程 tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px; margin-bottom: 15px; font-weight: bold; font-size: 20px; font-family: Calibri; visibility: visible;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

线性回归（`Linear Regression`{.js_darkmode__2
style="font-size: 14px;overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(30, 107, 184)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(30, 107, 184)"
darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgba(49, 56, 63, 0.05)"
darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05)"
data-style="font-size: 14px; overflow-wrap: break-word; padding: 2px 4px; border-radius: 4px; margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; color: rgb(30, 107, 184); background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all;"}）是机器学习中最简单的回归算法，多元线性回归指的就是一个样本有多个特征的线性回归问题。对于一个有
[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"} 个特征的样本
[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
而言，它的回归方程：

[]{style="cursor:pointer;" tool="mdnice编辑器"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

::: {.section role="presentation" formula="\\boldsymbol{\\hat{y}}=w_0+w_1\\boldsymbol{x_1}+w_2\\boldsymbol{x_2}+\\cdots+w_n\\boldsymbol{x_n}
" formula-type="block-equation" style="text-align: center;overflow: auto;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
:::

其中，[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
为模的参数，[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}为截距（`intercept`{.js_darkmode__3
style="font-size: 14px;overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(30, 107, 184)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(30, 107, 184)"
darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgba(49, 56, 63, 0.05)"
darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05)"
data-style="font-size: 14px; overflow-wrap: break-word; padding: 2px 4px; border-radius: 4px; margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; color: rgb(30, 107, 184); background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all;"}）；[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}为回归系数（`regression coefficient`{.js_darkmode__4
style="font-size: 14px;overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(30, 107, 184)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(30, 107, 184)"
darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgba(49, 56, 63, 0.05)"
darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05)"
data-style="font-size: 14px; overflow-wrap: break-word; padding: 2px 4px; border-radius: 4px; margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; color: rgb(30, 107, 184); background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all;"}）；[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
是目标变量，即标签；[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
是样本上的不同特征。

可以使用矩阵来表示这个方程，其中
[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
可以被看做是一个结构为[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}的列矩阵，
[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}是一个结构为[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}的特征矩阵，则有：

[]{style="cursor:pointer;" tool="mdnice编辑器"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

::: {.section role="presentation" formula="\\begin{bmatrix}  \\hat{y_1} \\\\ \\hat{y_1}\\\\ \\hat{y_1} \\\\ \\cdots \\\\ \\hat{y_1} \\end{bmatrix} = \\begin{bmatrix} 1 & x_{11} & x_{12} & x_{13} & \\cdots &  x_{1n}\\\\ 1 & x_{21} & x_{22} & x_{23} & \\cdots &  x_{2n}\\\\ 1 & x_{31} & x_{32} & x_{33} & \\cdots &  x_{3n} \\\\ & & \\cdots \\\\ 1 & x_{m1} & x_{m2} & x_{m3} & \\cdots &  x_{mn} \\end{bmatrix} \\times \\begin{bmatrix}  w_{0} \\\\ w_{1}\\\\ w_{2} \\\\ \\cdots \\\\ w_{n} \\end{bmatrix}
" formula-type="block-equation" style="text-align: center;overflow: auto;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
:::

简写为：

[]{style="cursor:pointer;" tool="mdnice编辑器"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

::: {.section role="presentation" formula="\\boldsymbol{\\hat{y}} = \\boldsymbol{X}\\boldsymbol{w}
" formula-type="block-equation" style="text-align: center;overflow: auto;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)
:::

> > 在19世纪的英国，有一位著名的生物学家高尔顿，在研究父母和孩子身高的遗传关系时，发现了一个直线方程，通过这个方程，他几乎准确地拟合了被调查父母的平均身高
> > [![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
> > darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
> > darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}
> > 和子女平均身高
> > [![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
> > darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
> > darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}
> > 之前的关系：`y=3.78+0.516x`{.js_darkmode__6
> > style="overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"
> > darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(30, 107, 184)"
> > darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(30, 107, 184)"
> > darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgba(49, 56, 63, 0.05)"
> > darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05)"
> > data-style="overflow-wrap: break-word; padding: 2px 4px; border-radius: 4px; margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; color: rgb(30, 107, 184); background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all;"}。它代表父母身高每增加**1个单位**，其成年子女的平均身高只增加**0.516个单位**，反映了一种\"衰退\"效应（\"回归\"到正常人平均身高）。虽然之后的
> > [![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
> > darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
> > darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}
> > 与
> > [![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
> > darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
> > darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}
> > 变量之间并不总是具有\"衰退\"（回归）关系，但是为了纪念高尔顿这位伟大的统计学家，\"线性回归\"
> > 这一名称就保留了下来。

### 损失函数 {#损失函数 tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px;margin-bottom: 15px;font-weight: bold;font-size: 20px;font-family: Calibri;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

#### 最小二乘法解释损失函数 {#最小二乘法解释损失函数 tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px;margin-bottom: 15px;font-weight: bold;font-size: 18px;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

一般情况误差
[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
有正有负，如果直接对
[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
求和，则会出现正负抵消的情况，反映不出整体误差情况。如果使用平方和，不仅可以避免正负抵消的缺陷，而且整体的误差分布不变，所以一般使用平方和做损失函数。

[]{style="cursor:pointer;" tool="mdnice编辑器"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

::: {.section role="presentation" formula="\\sum_{i=1}^m(y_i-\\hat{y}_i)^2=\\sum_{i=1}^m(y_i-\\boldsymbol{X}_i\\boldsymbol{w})^2
" formula-type="block-equation" style="text-align: center;overflow: auto;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
:::

其中
[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"} 是样本
[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
对应的真实标签，[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
(即[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"})是样本
[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"} 在一组参数
[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"} 下的预测标签。

由于每个样本的数据里存在较大差异，为了消除样本间差异的影响，使用最小化均方误差`MSE`{.js_darkmode__7
style="font-size: 14px;overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(30, 107, 184)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(30, 107, 184)"
darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgba(49, 56, 63, 0.05)"
darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05)"
data-style="font-size: 14px; overflow-wrap: break-word; padding: 2px 4px; border-radius: 4px; margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; color: rgb(30, 107, 184); background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all;"}拟合，并得到损失函数。

[]{style="cursor:pointer;" tool="mdnice编辑器"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

::: {.section role="presentation" formula="J(\\theta)=\\frac{1}{2m}\\sum_{i=1}^{m}(y_i-\\boldsymbol{X}_i\\boldsymbol{w})^2
" formula-type="block-equation" style="text-align: center;overflow: auto;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
:::

其中
[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
是为了求导计算的便利，而
[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
是将损失平均化，消除样本量m[带来的影响。]{.js_darkmode__8
style="letter-spacing: 0px;background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"
darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgb(25, 25, 25)"
darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(255, 255, 255)"
data-style="letter-spacing: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);"}

#### 极大似然估计解释损失函数 {#极大似然估计解释损失函数 tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px;margin-bottom: 15px;font-weight: bold;font-size: 18px;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

误差
[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
中，误差是独立同分布的，并且服从
[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
的高斯分布。其表达式为

[]{style="cursor:pointer;" tool="mdnice编辑器"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

::: {.section role="presentation" formula="f(x)=\\frac{1}{\\sqrt{2\\pi}\\sigma}exp^{\\frac{-(\\epsilon_i-\\mu)^2}{2\\sigma^2}}
" formula-type="block-equation" style="text-align: center;overflow: auto;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
:::

由于误差服从均值[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}，方差为
[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"} 的高斯分布

[]{style="cursor:pointer;" tool="mdnice编辑器"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

::: {.section role="presentation" formula="p(\\epsilon_i)=\\frac{1}{\\sqrt{2\\pi}\\sigma}exp^{\\frac{-(\\epsilon_i)^2}{2\\sigma^2}}
" formula-type="block-equation" style="text-align: center;overflow: auto;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
:::

::: {.section role="presentation" formula="p(y_i|X_i;w)=\\frac{1}{\\sqrt{2\\pi}\\sigma}exp^{\\frac{-(y_i-\\boldsymbol{X}_i\\boldsymbol{w})^2}{2\\sigma^2}}
" formula-type="block-equation" style="text-align: center;overflow: auto;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
:::

从式中可以看出，误差
[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
越小，[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
概率越大，说明预测值与真实值越接近。

因线性回归模型是一条直线（或超平面）拟合多个点，所以需要满足所有误[差 ]{.js_darkmode__9
style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-family: \"PingFang SC\", \"Microsoft YaHei\", sans-serif;font-size: 15px;text-align: left;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0, 0, 0)"
data-style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: \"PingFang SC\", \"Microsoft YaHei\", sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left;"}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.js_darkmode__10
style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-family: \"PingFang SC\", \"Microsoft YaHei\", sans-serif;font-size: 15px;text-align: left;cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0, 0, 0)"
data-style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: \"PingFang SC\", \"Microsoft YaHei\", sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left; cursor: pointer;"}[ ]{.js_darkmode__11
style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-family: \"PingFang SC\", \"Microsoft YaHei\", sans-serif;font-size: 15px;text-align: left;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0, 0, 0)"
data-style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: \"PingFang SC\", \"Microsoft YaHei\", sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left;"}取得最小值，即所有概率的乘积最大化，符合似然函数

[]{style="cursor:pointer;" tool="mdnice编辑器"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

::: {.section role="presentation" formula="L(w)=\\prod_{i=1}^mp(y_i|X_i;w)=\\prod_{i=1}^m\\frac{1}{\\sqrt{2\\pi}\\sigma}exp^{\\frac{-(y_i-\\boldsymbol{X}_i\\boldsymbol{w})^2}{2\\sigma^2}}
" formula-type="block-equation" style="text-align: center;overflow: auto;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
:::

::: {.section role="presentation" formula="\\begin{equation}\\begin{split}
logL(w)&=log\\prod_{i=1}^m\\frac{1}{\\sqrt{2\\pi}\\sigma}exp^{\\frac{-(y_i-\\boldsymbol{X}_i\\boldsymbol{w})^2}{2\\sigma^2}}\\\\
&=mlog\\frac{1}{\\sqrt{2\\pi}\\sigma}-\\frac1{\\sigma^2}\\cdot\\frac{1}{2}\\sum_{i=1}^{m}(y_i-\\boldsymbol{X}_i\\boldsymbol{w})^2
\\end{split}\\end{equation}
" formula-type="block-equation" style="text-align: center;overflow: auto;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
:::

式中第一项为定值，因此需要第二项最小化，于是得到损失函数

[]{style="cursor:pointer;" tool="mdnice编辑器"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

::: {.section role="presentation" formula="J(w)=\\frac{1}{2}\\sum_{i=1}^{m}(y_i-\\boldsymbol{X}_i\\boldsymbol{w})^2
" formula-type="block-equation" style="text-align: center;overflow: auto;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
:::

同样乘以一个[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
以消除样本量[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}带来的影响，
将损失平均化。

损失函数衡量了所构造的模型的预测结果和真实标签的差异，希望预测结果和真实值差异越小越好，即求解目标函数可以转化为

[]{style="cursor:pointer;" tool="mdnice编辑器"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

::: {.section role="presentation" formula="\\min_w{||\\boldsymbol{y}-\\boldsymbol{X}\\boldsymbol{w}||_2}^2
" formula-type="block-equation" style="text-align: center;overflow: auto;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)
:::

其中右下角的2表示向量
[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
的`L2`{.js_darkmode__12
style="font-size: 14px;overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(30, 107, 184)"

darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgba(49, 56, 63, 0.05)"
darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05)"
data-style="font-size: 14px; overflow-wrap: break-word; padding: 2px 4px; border-radius: 4px; margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; color: rgb(30, 107, 184); background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all;"}范式，称其为`SSE`{.js_darkmode__13
style="font-size: 14px;overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"

style="font-size: 14px;overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"

darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05)"
data-style="font-size: 14px; overflow-wrap: break-word; padding: 2px 4px; border-radius: 4px; margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; color: rgb(30, 107, 184); background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all;"}，误差平方和）或者`RSS`{.js_darkmode__15

残差平方和）。

### 多元线性回归的参数求解 {#多元线性回归的参数求解 tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px;margin-bottom: 15px;font-weight: bold;font-size: 20px;font-family: Calibri;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

#### 最小二乘法 {#最小二乘法 tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px;margin-bottom: 15px;font-weight: bold;font-size: 18px;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

通过最小化真实值和预测值之间的`RSS`{.js_darkmode__17
style="margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;padding: 2px 4px;text-align: left;white-space: normal;font-size: 14px;overflow-wrap: break-word;border-radius: 4px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(30, 107, 184)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(30, 107, 184)"
darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgba(49, 56, 63, 0.05)"
darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05)"
data-style="margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; padding: 2px 4px; text-align: left; white-space: normal; font-size: 14px; overflow-wrap: break-word; border-radius: 4px; color: rgb(30, 107, 184); background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all;"}来求解参数的方法叫做最小二乘法。

[]{style="cursor:pointer;" tool="mdnice编辑器"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

::: {.section role="presentation" formula="\\begin{equation}\\begin{split}
\\frac{\\partial{RSS}}{\\partial{\\boldsymbol{w}}}&=\\frac{\\partial{{||\\boldsymbol{y}-\\boldsymbol{X}\\boldsymbol{w}||_2}^2}}{\\partial{\\boldsymbol{w}}} \\\\
&=\\frac{\\partial{{(\\boldsymbol{y}-\\boldsymbol{X}\\boldsymbol{w})}^T{(\\boldsymbol{y}-\\boldsymbol{X}\\boldsymbol{w})}}}{\\partial{\\boldsymbol{w}}}\\\\
&=\\frac{\\partial{{(\\boldsymbol{y^T}-\\boldsymbol{w^T}\\boldsymbol{X^T})}^T{(\\boldsymbol{y}-\\boldsymbol{X}\\boldsymbol{w})}}}{\\partial{\\boldsymbol{w}}}\\\\
& =\\frac{\\partial{{(\\boldsymbol{y^Ty}-\\boldsymbol{w^T}\\boldsymbol{X^T}\\boldsymbol{y}-\\boldsymbol{y^T}\\boldsymbol{X}\\boldsymbol{w}+\\boldsymbol{w^T}\\boldsymbol{X^T\\boldsymbol{X}\\boldsymbol{w}})}}}{\\partial{\\boldsymbol{w}}}\\\\
& =0-\\boldsymbol{X^T}\\boldsymbol{y}-\\boldsymbol{X^T}\\boldsymbol{y}+2\\boldsymbol{X^T}\\boldsymbol{X}\\boldsymbol{w} \\\\
&=\\boldsymbol{X^T}\\boldsymbol{X}\\boldsymbol{w} -\\boldsymbol{X^T}\\boldsymbol{y}
\\end{split}\\end{equation}
" formula-type="block-equation" style="text-align: center;overflow: auto;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
:::

以上用到的规则：详情请见[\[[https://blog.csdn.net/mounty_fsc/article/details/51588794]{.js_darkmode__18
style="font-size: 12px;color: rgb(91, 128, 141);font-family: \"Open Sans\", \"Clear Sans\", \"Helvetica Neue\", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;orphans: 4;text-align: start;white-space: pre-wrap;background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);text-decoration: underline;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(91, 128, 141)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(91, 128, 141)"
darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgb(25, 25, 25)"
darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(255, 255, 255)"
data-style="font-size: 12px; color: rgb(91, 128, 141); font-family: \"Open Sans\", \"Clear Sans\", \"Helvetica Neue\", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; orphans: 4; text-align: start; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); text-decoration: underline;"}\]]{style="font-size: 12px;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

[]{style="cursor:pointer;" tool="mdnice编辑器"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

::: {.section role="presentation" formula="(A-B)^T=A^T-B^T
" formula-type="block-equation" style="text-align: center;overflow: auto;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

" formula-type="block-equation" style="text-align: center;overflow: auto;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

" formula-type="block-equation" style="text-align: center;overflow: auto;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)
:::

::: {.section .js_darkmode__19 tool="mdnice编辑器" website="https://www.mdnice.com" style="font-size: 16px;color: black;padding-right: 10px;padding-left: 10px;line-height: 1.6;letter-spacing: 0px;word-break: break-word;overflow-wrap: break-word;text-align: left;font-family: \"PingFang SC\", \"Microsoft YaHei\", sans-serif;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)" data-style="font-size: 16px; color: black; padding-right: 10px; padding-left: 10px; line-height: 1.6; letter-spacing: 0px; word-break: break-word; overflow-wrap: break-word; text-align: left; font-family: \"PingFang SC\", \"Microsoft YaHei\", sans-serif;"}
[令（2）求导后一阶导数为0：]{style="letter-spacing: 0px;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}\
:::

[]{style="cursor: pointer;font-size: 15px;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

::: {.section role="presentation" formula="\\begin{equation}\\begin{split}
\\boldsymbol{X^T}\\boldsymbol{X}\\boldsymbol{w} -\\boldsymbol{X^T}\\boldsymbol{y}&=0 \\\\
\\boldsymbol{X^T}\\boldsymbol{X}\\boldsymbol{w} & =\\boldsymbol{X^T}\\boldsymbol{y} \\\\
\\boldsymbol{w} & = (\\boldsymbol{X^T}\\boldsymbol{X})^{-1}\\boldsymbol{X^T}\\boldsymbol{y}
\\end{split}\\end{equation}
" formula-type="block-equation" style="text-align: center;overflow: auto;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
:::

[在这里可以看出，注意到[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}是一个矩阵乘以它自身的转置，得到的是一个实对称]{style="font-size: 15px;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}的方阵。如果它是可逆的，则等式左右两边同乘
[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"} ，从而得到
[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}。因此，逆矩阵存在的充分必要条件是特征矩阵不存在多重共线性。下篇会详细介绍多重共线性问题及解决。

#### 梯度下降法 {#梯度下降法 tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px;margin-bottom: 15px;font-weight: bold;font-size: 18px;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

前面使用最小二乘法求出使得损失函数最小化的参数
[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}，而实际问题中常使用梯度下降法。首先，最小二乘法是通过平方损失函数建立模型优化目标函数的一种思路，求解最优模型过程便具体化为最优化目标函数的过程；而梯度下降法是最优化目标函数的一种优化算法，具体求解使得目标函数能达到最优或者近似最优的参数集。再者，实际问题中
[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
不是满秩矩阵，不可逆，最小二乘法无法解决，而梯度下降法可以。[如果维度多、样本多，即便有逆矩阵，计算机求解的速度也会很慢。]{.js_darkmode__20
style="font-family: \"Open Sans\", \"Clear Sans\", \"Helvetica Neue\", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;orphans: 4;text-align: start;white-space: pre-wrap;background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);font-size: 15px;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"
darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgb(25, 25, 25)"
darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(255, 255, 255)"
data-style="font-family: \"Open Sans\", \"Clear Sans\", \"Helvetica Neue\", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; orphans: 4; text-align: start; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-size: 15px;"}

损失函数为凸函数，其表达式

[]{style="cursor:pointer;" tool="mdnice编辑器"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

::: {.section role="presentation" formula="J(w)=\\frac{1}{2m}(wX-Y)^T(wX-Y)
" formula-type="block-equation" style="text-align: center;overflow: auto;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
:::

对[参[数 ]{.js_darkmode__22
style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-family: \"PingFang SC\", \"Microsoft YaHei\", sans-serif;font-size: 15px;text-align: left;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0, 0, 0)|rgb(0, 0, 0)"
data-style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: \"PingFang SC\", \"Microsoft YaHei\", sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left;"}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.js_darkmode__23
style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-family: \"PingFang SC\", \"Microsoft YaHei\", sans-serif;font-size: 15px;text-align: left;cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0, 0, 0)|rgb(0, 0, 0)"
data-style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: \"PingFang SC\", \"Microsoft YaHei\", sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left; cursor: pointer;"}[ ]{.js_darkmode__24
style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-family: \"PingFang SC\", \"Microsoft YaHei\", sans-serif;font-size: 15px;text-align: left;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0, 0, 0)|rgb(0, 0, 0)"
data-style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: \"PingFang SC\", \"Microsoft YaHei\", sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left;"}]{.js_darkmode__21
style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-family: \"PingFang SC\", \"Microsoft YaHei\", sans-serif;font-size: 15px;text-align: left;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0, 0, 0)"
data-style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: \"PingFang SC\", \"Microsoft YaHei\", sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left;"}求导

[]{style="cursor:pointer;" tool="mdnice编辑器"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

::: {.section role="presentation" formula="\\begin{equation}\\begin{split}
\\frac{\\partial}{\\partial{w}}j(w)&=\\frac{1}{2m}\\frac{\\partial}{\\partial{w}}(w^TX^TwX-w^TX^TY-wXY^T+Y^TY)\\\\
&=\\frac{1}{2m}(2X^TwX-X^TY-X^TY)\\\\
&=\\frac1m(X^TwX-X^TY)\\\\
&=\\frac1mX^T(wX-Y)
\\end{split}\\end{equation}
" formula-type="block-equation" style="text-align: center;overflow: auto;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
:::

::: {.section .js_darkmode__25 tool="mdnice编辑器" website="https://www.mdnice.com" style="font-size: 16px;color: black;padding-right: 10px;padding-left: 10px;line-height: 1.6;letter-spacing: 0px;word-break: break-word;overflow-wrap: break-word;text-align: left;font-family: \"PingFang SC\", \"Microsoft YaHei\", sans-serif;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)" data-style="font-size: 16px; color: black; padding-right: 10px; padding-left: 10px; line-height: 1.6; letter-spacing: 0px; word-break: break-word; overflow-wrap: break-word; text-align: left; font-family: \"PingFang SC\", \"Microsoft YaHei\", sans-serif;"}
将上述梯度带入随机梯度下降公式

[]{style="cursor:pointer;" tool="mdnice编辑器"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}

::: {.section role="presentation" formula="\\Theta_{k+1}=\\Theta_{k}-\\frac{\\alpha}{m}X^T(wX-Y)
" formula-type="block-equation" style="text-align: center;overflow: auto;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}
:::

::: {.section .js_darkmode__26 tool="mdnice编辑器" website="https://www.mdnice.com" style="font-size: 16px;color: black;padding-right: 10px;padding-left: 10px;line-height: 1.6;letter-spacing: 0px;word-break: break-word;overflow-wrap: break-word;text-align: left;font-family: \"PingFang SC\", \"Microsoft YaHei\", sans-serif;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)" data-style="font-size: 16px; color: black; padding-right: 10px; padding-left: 10px; line-height: 1.6; letter-spacing: 0px; word-break: break-word; overflow-wrap: break-word; text-align: left; font-family: \"PingFang SC\", \"Microsoft YaHei\", sans-serif;"}
这个式子中，[[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{role="presentation"
formula="X" formula-type="inline-equation" style=""
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}]{style="cursor:pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}矩阵和[[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{role="presentation"
formula="Y" formula-type="inline-equation" style=""
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}]{style="cursor:pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}向量都是已知的，步长是人为设定的一个值，只有参数[[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{role="presentation"
formula="w" formula-type="inline-equation" style=""
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}]{style="cursor:pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}是未知的，而每一步的[[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{role="presentation"
formula="\\Theta" formula-type="inline-equation" style=""
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}]{style="cursor:pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}是由[[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{role="presentation"
formula="w" formula-type="inline-equation" style=""
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}]{style="cursor:pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}决定的，也就是每一步的点坐标。
:::

> > **算法过程**
> >
> > 1，
> > 初始化[[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{role="presentation"
> > formula="w" formula-type="inline-equation" style=""
> > darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
> > darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}]{style="cursor:pointer;"
> > darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
> > darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}向量的值，即[[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{role="presentation"
> > formula="\\Theta_0" formula-type="inline-equation" style=""
> > darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
> > darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}]{style="cursor:pointer;"
> > darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
> > darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}，将其带入[[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{role="presentation"
> > formula="\\frac{\\partial}{\\partial{w}}j(w)"
> > formula-type="inline-equation" style=""
> > darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
> > darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}]{style="cursor:pointer;"
> > darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
> > darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}得到当前位置的梯度；
> >
> > 2，当前梯度乘以步长[[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{role="presentation"
> > formula="\\alpha" formula-type="inline-equation" style=""
> > darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
> > darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}]{style="cursor:pointer;"
> > darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
> > darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}，得到从当前位置下降的距离；
> >
> > 3，更新得到新表达式
> >  [[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{role="presentation"
> > formula="\\Theta_1=\\Theta_0-\\frac{\\alpha}{m}X^T(wX-Y)"
> > formula-type="inline-equation" style=""
> > darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
> > darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}]{style="cursor:pointer;"
> > darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
> > darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}
> >
> > 4，重复以上步骤，直到更新到[[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{role="presentation"
> > formula="\\Theta_k" formula-type="inline-equation" style=""
> > darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
> > darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}]{style="cursor:pointer;"
> > darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
> > darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}，直至触发停止条件，即得到目标函数能达到最优或者近似最优的参数向量。
:::

梯度下降不一定能够找到全局的最优解，有可能是一个局部最优解。当然，如果损失函数是凸函数，梯度下降法得到的解就一定是全局最优解。

### `linear_model.LinearRegression`{darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"} {#linear_model.linearregression tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px;margin-bottom: 15px;font-weight: bold;font-size: 20px;font-family: Calibri;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

##### [语法：]{.js_darkmode__32 style="font-size: 14px;margin-top: 3px;color: rgb(120, 172, 254);" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(118, 169, 250)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(120, 172, 254)" data-style="font-size: 14px; margin-top: 3px; color: rgb(120, 172, 254);"} {#语法 tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px;margin-bottom: 15px;font-weight: bold;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

``` {tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 10px;margin-bottom: 10px;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression LinearRegression(fit_intercept=True,normalize=False,copy_X=True,n_jobs=1)
```

普通最小二乘线性回归。线性回归拟合系数为`w = (w1，…，wp)`{.js_darkmode__36
style="font-size: 14px;overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(30, 107, 184)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(30, 107, 184)"
darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgba(49, 56, 63, 0.05)"
darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05)"
data-style="font-size: 14px; overflow-wrap: break-word; padding: 2px 4px; border-radius: 4px; margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; color: rgb(30, 107, 184); background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all;"}的线性模型，以最小化数据集中观察到的目标和通过线性逼近预测的目标之间的残差平方和。

##### [参数：]{.js_darkmode__37 style="font-size: 14px;margin-top: 3px;color: rgb(120, 172, 254);" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(118, 169, 250)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(120, 172, 254)" data-style="font-size: 14px; margin-top: 3px; color: rgb(120, 172, 254);"} {#参数 tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px;margin-bottom: 15px;font-weight: bold;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

> **fit_intercept** :  *boolean, optional, default True*
>
> 是否计算此模型的截距。如果设置为False，则不会计算截距。
>
> **normalize** : *boolean, optional, default False*
>
> 当`fit_intercept`{.js_darkmode__43
> style="overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"
> darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(30, 107, 184)"
> darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(106, 115, 125)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(30, 107, 184)"
> darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgba(49, 56, 63, 0.05)"
> darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)|rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05)"
> data-style="overflow-wrap: break-word; padding: 2px 4px; border-radius: 4px; margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; color: rgb(30, 107, 184); background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all;"}设置为`False`{.js_darkmode__44
> style="overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"
> darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(30, 107, 184)"
> darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(106, 115, 125)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(30, 107, 184)"

> style="overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"

> darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(106, 115, 125)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(30, 107, 184)"

> darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)|rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05)"
> data-style="overflow-wrap: break-word; padding: 2px 4px; border-radius: 4px; margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; color: rgb(30, 107, 184); background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all;"}，则特征矩阵`X`{.js_darkmode__46
> style="overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"
> darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(30, 107, 184)"
> darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(106, 115, 125)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(30, 107, 184)"
> darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgba(49, 56, 63, 0.05)"
> darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)|rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05)"
> data-style="overflow-wrap: break-word; padding: 2px 4px; border-radius: 4px; margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; color: rgb(30, 107, 184); background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all;"}在进入回归之前将会被减去均值（中心化）并除以`L2`{.js_darkmode__47
> style="overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"
> darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(30, 107, 184)"
> darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(106, 115, 125)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(30, 107, 184)"
> darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgba(49, 56, 63, 0.05)"

> darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgba(49, 56, 63, 0.05)"
> darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)|rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05)"
> data-style="overflow-wrap: break-word; padding: 2px 4px; border-radius: 4px; margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; color: rgb(30, 107, 184); background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all;"}来进行计算。

从参数可以看出，其参数较少，仅有四个参数就可以完成一个完整的算法。线性回归模型简单，其性能取决于数据本身，而非调参好坏。虽然线性回归对数据有着很高的要求，但大部分连续型变量之间，都存在着或多或少的联系。因此，在 合适的数据集下，线性回归简单而强大。

##### [属性：]{.js_darkmode__63 style="font-size: 14px;margin-top: 3px;color: rgb(120, 172, 254);" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(118, 169, 250)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(120, 172, 254)" data-style="font-size: 14px; margin-top: 3px; color: rgb(120, 172, 254);"} {#属性 tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px;margin-bottom: 15px;font-weight: bold;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

> n_features)*

> darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(30, 107, 184)"

> darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)|rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05)"
> data-style="overflow-wrap: break-word; padding: 2px 4px; border-radius: 4px; margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; color: rgb(30, 107, 184); background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all;"}或者`(n_targets, n_features)`{.js_darkmode__68
> style="overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"
> darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(30, 107, 184)"
> darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(106, 115, 125)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(30, 107, 184)"
> darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgba(49, 56, 63, 0.05)"

> 线性回归方程中估计出的系数。如果在`fit`{.js_darkmode__69
> style="overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"

> **intercept\_** :  *float or array of shape (n_targets,)*
>
> 数组，线性回归中的截距项。

##### [例：]{.js_darkmode__75 style="font-size: 14px;margin-top: 3px;color: rgb(120, 172, 254);" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(118, 169, 250)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(120, 172, 254)" data-style="font-size: 14px; margin-top: 3px; color: rgb(120, 172, 254);"} {#例 tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px;margin-bottom: 15px;font-weight: bold;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

``` {tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 10px;margin-bottom: 10px;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
>>> import numpy as np
>>> from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression
>>> X = np.array([[1, 1], [1, 2], [2, 2], [2, 3]])
>>> # y = 1   x_0 + 2   x_1 + 3
>>> y = np.dot(X, np.array([1, 2])) + 3
>>> reg = LinearRegression().fit(X, y)
>>> reg.score(X, y)
1.0
>>> reg.coef_
array([1., 2.])
>>> reg.intercept_
3.0000...
>>> reg.predict(np.array([[3, 5]]))
array([16.])
```

## [评估指标]{style="display: inline-block;background: rgb(0, 128, 255);color: rgb(255, 255, 255);padding: 2px 10px 1px;border-top-right-radius: 3px;border-top-left-radius: 3px;margin-right: 3px;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(255, 255, 255)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(255, 255, 255)" darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgb(0, 128, 255)" darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0, 128, 255)"}[ ]{.js_darkmode__81 style="display: inline-block;vertical-align: bottom;border-bottom: 31px solid #efebe9;border-right: 25px solid transparent;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)" data-style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: bottom; border-bottom: 31px solid rgb(239, 235, 233); border-right: 25px solid transparent;"} {#评 估指标 tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px;margin-bottom: 15px;font-weight: bold;border-bottom: 3px solid rgb(0, 128, 255);font-size: 1.1em;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

回归类算法的模型评估与分类型算法的模型评估其实是相似的法则------找真实标签和预测值的差异。在分类型算法中，评判否预测到了正确的分类，而在我们的回归类算法中，评判是否预测到了正确的数值、以及是否拟合到了足够的信息 。

### 绝对误差 MAE {#绝对误差-mae tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px;margin-bottom: 15px;font-weight: bold;font-size: 20px;font-family: Calibri;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

\-\-\-- 是否预测了正确的数值

`sklearn`{.js_darkmode__82
style="font-size: 14px;overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"

的变体，均方误差`MSE`{.js_darkmode__84

style="font-size: 14px;overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"

### 均方误差MSE {#均方误差mse tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px;margin-bottom: 15px;font-weight: bold;font-size: 20px;font-family: Calibri;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

[]{style="cursor:pointer;" tool="mdnice编辑器"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

::: {.section role="presentation" formula="MSE=\\frac1m\\sum_{i=1}^m(f(x_i)−y_i)^2
" formula-type="block-equation" style="text-align: center;overflow: auto;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
:::

在`sklearn`{.js_darkmode__86
style="font-size: 14px;overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"

style="font-size: 14px;overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"

style="font-size: 14px;overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"

``` {tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 10px;margin-bottom: 10px;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
sklearn.metrics.mean_squared_error(y_true, y_pred, *, sample_weight=None, multioutput='uniform_average', squared=True)

sklearn.model_selection.cross_val_score(reg,X,y,cv=10,scoring="neg_mean_squared_error")
```

> **squared bool**, *default=True*  If True returns MSE value, if False
> returns RMSE value.

> > 这里注意`scoring="neg_mean_squared_error"`{.js_darkmode__96
> > style="overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"

> > **均方误差为负**是因为`sklearn`{.js_darkmode__97
> > style="overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"
> > darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(30, 107, 184)"
> > darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(30, 107, 184)"
> > darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgba(49, 56, 63, 0.05)"
> > darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05)"
> > data-style="overflow-wrap: break-word; padding: 2px 4px; border-radius: 4px; margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; color: rgb(30, 107, 184); background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all;"}在计算模型评估指标的时，认为均方误差本身是一种误差，是模型的一种损失(`loss`{.js_darkmode__98
> > style="overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"

> > darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(30, 107, 184)"
> > darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgba(49, 56, 63, 0.05)"
> > darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05)"
> > data-style="overflow-wrap: break-word; padding: 2px 4px; border-radius: 4px; margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; color: rgb(30, 107, 184); background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all;"})。在`sklearn`{.js_darkmode__99
> > style="overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"
> > darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(30, 107, 184)"
> > darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(30, 107, 184)"

### 均方根误差RMSE {#均方根误差rmse tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px;margin-bottom: 15px;font-weight: bold;font-size: 20px;font-family: Calibri;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

**RMSE为MSE的算术平方根**

[]{style="cursor:pointer;" tool="mdnice编辑器"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

::: {.section role="presentation" formula="RMSE=\\sqrt{MSE}
" formula-type="block-equation" style="text-align: center;overflow: auto;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)
:::

缺点：因使用平均误差，平均误差对异常值比较敏感，异常值的出现，使得`RMSE`{.js_darkmode__100
style="font-size: 14px;overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(30, 107, 184)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(30, 107, 184)"
darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgba(49, 56, 63, 0.05)"
darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05)"
data-style="font-size: 14px; overflow-wrap: break-word; padding: 2px 4px; border-radius: 4px; margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; color: rgb(30, 107, 184); background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all;"}的误差较大。

##### [例：]{.js_darkmode__101 style="font-size: 14px;margin-top: 3px;color: rgb(120, 172, 254);" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(118, 169, 250)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(120, 172, 254)" data-style="font-size: 14px; margin-top: 3px; color: rgb(120, 172, 254);"} {#例-1 tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px;margin-bottom: 15px;font-weight: bold;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

``` {tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 10px;margin-bottom: 10px;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
>>> from sklearn.metrics import mean_squared_error
>>> y_true = [3, -0.5, 2, 7]
>>> y_pred = [2.5, 0.0, 2, 8]
>>> mean_squared_error(y_true, y_pred)
0.375
>>> y_true = [3, -0.5, 2, 7]
>>> y_pred = [2.5, 0.0, 2, 8]
>>> mean_squared_error(y_true, y_pred, squared=False)   
0.612...
>>> y_true = [[0.5, 1],[-1, 1],[7, -6]]
>>> y_pred = [[0, 2],[-1, 2],[8, -5]]
>>> mean_squared_error(y_true, y_pred)
0.708...
>>> mean_squared_error(y_true, y_pred, squared=False)
0.822...
>>> mean_squared_error(y_true, y_pred, multioutput='raw_values')
array([0.41666667, 1.        ])
>>> mean_squared_error(y_true, y_pred, multioutput=[0.3, 0.7])
0.825...
```

同样可以在`sklearn`{.js_darkmode__105
style="font-size: 14px;overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(30, 107, 184)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(30, 107, 184)"
darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgba(49, 56, 63, 0.05)"
darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05)"
data-style="font-size: 14px; overflow-wrap: break-word; padding: 2px 4px; border-radius: 4px; margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; color: rgb(30, 107, 184); background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all;"}当中，使用命令`from sklearn.metrics import mean_absolute_error`{.js_darkmode__106
style="font-size: 14px;overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(30, 107, 184)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(30, 107, 184)"
darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgba(49, 56, 63, 0.05)"
darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05)"

[]{style="cursor:pointer;" tool="mdnice编辑器"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"

::: {.section role="presentation" formula="MAE=\\frac1m\\sum_{i=1}^m|f(x_i)−y_i|
" formula-type="block-equation" style="text-align: center;overflow: auto;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
:::

``` {tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 10px;margin-bottom: 10px;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
sklearn.metrics.mean_absolute_error(y_true, y_pred, *, sample_weight=None, multioutput='uniform_average')
```

``` {tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 10px;margin-bottom: 10px;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
>>> from sklearn.metrics import mean_absolute_error
>>> y_true = [3, -0.5, 2, 7]
>>> y_pred = [2.5, 0.0, 2, 8]
>>> mean_absolute_error(y_true, y_pred)
0.5
>>> y_true = [[0.5, 1], [-1, 1], [7, -6]]
>>> y_pred = [[0, 2], [-1, 2], [8, -5]]
>>> mean_absolute_error(y_true, y_pred)
0.75
>>> mean_absolute_error(y_true, y_pred, multioutput='raw_values')
array([0.5, 1. ])
>>> mean_absolute_error(y_true, y_pred, multioutput=[0.3, 0.7])
0.85...
```

### [![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"} (决定系数) {#决定系数 tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px;margin-bottom: 15px;font-weight: bold;font-size: 20px;font-family: Calibri;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

\-\-\-- 是否拟合了足够的信息

方差的本质是任意一个值和样本均值的差异，差异越大，这些值所带的信息越多。由此可以用来衡量数据上的信息量。如果方差越大，代表数据上的信息量越多，而这个信息量不仅包括了数值的大小，还包括了希望模型捕捉的那些规律。[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
为衡量模型对数据上的信息量的捕捉而生。

[]{style="cursor:pointer;" tool="mdnice编辑器"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

::: {.section role="presentation" formula="R^2=\\frac{SSR}{SST}=\\frac{SSR}{SSR+SSE}
" formula-type="block-equation" style="text-align: center;overflow: auto;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
:::

总平方和（SST）= 回归平方和（SSR）+ 残差平方和（SSE）

[]{style="cursor:pointer;" tool="mdnice编辑器"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

::: {.section role="presentation" formula="R^2=1−\\frac{\\sum^m_{i=1}(f(x_i)−y_i)^2}{\\sum^m_{i=1}(f(x_i)−\\overline y_i)^2}
" formula-type="block-equation" style="text-align: center;overflow: auto;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
:::

其中，[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
为真实标签，[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
为预测结果，[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
为样本均值。[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"} 比
样本量[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"} 即为样本方差。

> > 数学理解：
> >
> > 1,
> > [![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
> > darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
> > darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)"}
> > 衡量的是**1 - 模型没有拟合到的信息占真实标签中所带的信息量**。
> >
> > 2, 分母理解为**原始数据的离散程度**，方差，即真实标签所带的信息量。
> >
> > 3,分子为**预测数据和原始数据的误差**，残差平方和模型没有拟合到的信息。
> >
> > 4, 两者相除可以消除原始数据离散程度的影响。

> > 理论上取值(−∞,1\]，正常取值范围为\[0, 1\]
> >
> > -   ::: {.section .js_darkmode__129 style="margin-top: 5px;margin-bottom: 5px;line-height: 26px;color: rgb(1, 1, 1);" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(1, 1, 1)" data-style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; line-height: 26px; color: rgb(1, 1, 1);"}
> >     越接近1，模型对数据拟合的越好。
> >     :::
> >
> > -   ::: {.section .js_darkmode__130 style="margin-top: 5px;margin-bottom: 5px;line-height: 26px;color: rgb(1, 1, 1);" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(1, 1, 1)" data-style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; line-height: 26px; color: rgb(1, 1, 1);"}
> >     越接近0，表明模型拟合的越差。
> >     :::
> >
> > -   ::: {.section .js_darkmode__131 style="margin-top: 5px;margin-bottom: 5px;line-height: 26px;color: rgb(1, 1, 1);" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(1, 1, 1)" data-style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; line-height: 26px; color: rgb(1, 1, 1);"}
> >     小于0（为负），说明模型拟合到的全部信息小于残差平方和
> >     :::

**缺点:**

-   ::: {.section .js_darkmode__132 style="margin-top: 5px;margin-bottom: 5px;line-height: 26px;color: rgb(1, 1, 1);" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(1, 1, 1)" data-style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; line-height: 26px; color: rgb(1, 1, 1);"}
    数据集的样本越[大，[ ]{.js_darkmode__133
    style="font-size: 14px;color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-family: \"PingFang SC\", \"Microsoft YaHei\", sans-serif;text-align: left;"
    darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
    darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(1, 1, 1)|rgb(0, 0, 0)"
    data-style="font-size: 14px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: \"PingFang SC\", \"Microsoft YaHei\", sans-serif; text-align: left;"}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.js_darkmode__134
    style="font-size: 14px;color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-family: \"PingFang SC\", \"Microsoft YaHei\", sans-serif;text-align: left;cursor: pointer;"
    darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
    darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(1, 1, 1)|rgb(0, 0, 0)"
    data-style="font-size: 14px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: \"PingFang SC\", \"Microsoft YaHei\", sans-serif; text-align: left; cursor: pointer;"}[ ]{.js_darkmode__135
    style="font-size: 14px;color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-family: \"PingFang SC\", \"Microsoft YaHei\", sans-serif;text-align: left;"
    darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
    darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(1, 1, 1)|rgb(0, 0, 0)"
    data-style="font-size: 14px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: \"PingFang SC\", \"Microsoft YaHei\", sans-serif; text-align: left;"}越]{style="font-size: 14px;"
    darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
    darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(1, 1, 1)"}大。
    :::

-   ::: {.section .js_darkmode__136 style="margin-top: 5px;margin-bottom: 5px;line-height: 26px;color: rgb(1, 1, 1);" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(1, 1, 1)" data-style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; line-height: 26px; color: rgb(1, 1, 1);"}
    不同数据集的模型结果比较会有一定的误差。
    :::

[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

data-style="font-size: 14px; overflow-wrap: break-word; padding: 2px 4px; border-radius: 4px; margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; color: rgb(30, 107, 184); background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all;"}，输入预测值和真实值后打分。第二是从线性回归`LinearRegression`{.js_darkmode__139

data-style="font-size: 14px; overflow-wrap: break-word; padding: 2px 4px; border-radius: 4px; margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; color: rgb(30, 107, 184); background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all;"}的接口`score`{.js_darkmode__140
style="font-size: 14px;overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"

darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgba(49, 56, 63, 0.05)"
darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05)"
data-style="font-size: 14px; overflow-wrap: break-word; padding: 2px 4px; border-radius: 4px; margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; color: rgb(30, 107, 184); background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all;"}来进行调用。第三是在交叉验证中，输入`scoring = "r2"`{.js_darkmode__141
style="font-size: 14px;overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"
darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(30, 107, 184)"
darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(30, 107, 184)"
darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgba(49, 56, 63, 0.05)"
darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05)"
data-style="font-size: 14px; overflow-wrap: break-word; padding: 2px 4px; border-radius: 4px; margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; color: rgb(30, 107, 184); background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all;"}来调用。

``` {tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 10px;margin-bottom: 10px;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
sklearn.metrics.r2_score(y_true, y_pred, *, sample_weight=None, multioutput='uniform_average')
```

``` {tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 10px;margin-bottom: 10px;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
>>> from sklearn.metrics import r2_score
>>> y_true = [3, -0.5, 2, 7]
>>> y_pred = [2.5, 0.0, 2, 8]
>>> r2_score(y_true, y_pred)
0.948...
>>> y_true = [[0.5, 1], [-1, 1], [7, -6]]
>>> y_pred = [[0, 2], [-1, 2], [8, -5]]
>>> r2_score(y_true, y_pred,
...          multioutput='variance_weighted')
0.938...
>>> y_true = [1, 2, 3]
>>> y_pred = [1, 2, 3]
>>> r2_score(y_true, y_pred)
1.0
>>> y_true = [1, 2, 3]
>>> y_pred = [2, 2, 2]
>>> r2_score(y_true, y_pred)
0.0
>>> y_true = [1, 2, 3]
>>> y_pred = [3, 2, 1]
>>> r2_score(y_true, y_pred)
-3.0
```

> **multioutput**:
> *{\'raw_values\'，\'uniform_average\'，\'variance_weighted\'}，array
> like of shape(n_output，) or None，default=\'uniform_average\'*
>
> 定义多个输出分数的聚合。类数组值定义用于平均得分的权重。默认设置是`"uniform_average"`{.js_darkmode__149
> style="overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"
> darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(30, 107, 184)"
> darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(106, 115, 125)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(30, 107, 184)"
> darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgba(49, 56, 63, 0.05)"
> darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)|rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05)"
> data-style="overflow-wrap: break-word; padding: 2px 4px; border-radius: 4px; margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; color: rgb(30, 107, 184); background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all;"}。
>
> `"raw_values"`{.js_darkmode__151
> style="overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"
> darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(30, 107, 184)"
> darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(106, 115, 125)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(30, 107, 184)"
> darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgba(49, 56, 63, 0.05)"
> darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)|rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05)"
> data-style="overflow-wrap: break-word; padding: 2px 4px; border-radius: 4px; margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; color: rgb(30, 107, 184); background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all;"}:
> 在多输出输入的情况下返回完整的分数集。
>
> `"uniform_average"`{.js_darkmode__153
> style="overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"
> darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(30, 107, 184)"
> darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(106, 115, 125)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(30, 107, 184)"
> darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgba(49, 56, 63, 0.05)"
> darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)|rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05)"
> data-style="overflow-wrap: break-word; padding: 2px 4px; border-radius: 4px; margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; color: rgb(30, 107, 184); background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all;"}:
> 对所有输出的分数取平均值，权重一致。
>
> `"variance_weighted"`{.js_darkmode__155
> style="overflow-wrap: break-word;padding: 2px 4px;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 2px;margin-left: 2px;color: rgb(30, 107, 184);background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05);font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace;word-break: break-all;"
> darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(30, 107, 184)"
> darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(106, 115, 125)|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(30, 107, 184)"
> darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgba(49, 56, 63, 0.05)"
> darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)|rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05)"
> data-style="overflow-wrap: break-word; padding: 2px 4px; border-radius: 4px; margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; color: rgb(30, 107, 184); background-color: rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); font-family: \"Operator Mono\", Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all;"}:
> 所有输出的分数取平均值，用每个单个输出的方差加权。

## [简单总结]{style="display: inline-block;background: rgb(0, 128, 255);color: rgb(255, 255, 255);padding: 2px 10px 1px;border-top-right-radius: 3px;border-top-left-radius: 3px;margin-right: 3px;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(255, 255, 255)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(255, 255, 255)" darkmode-bgcolor-16336956109062="rgb(0, 128, 255)" darkmode-original-bgcolor-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0, 128, 255)"}[ ]{.js_darkmode__156 style="display: inline-block;vertical-align: bottom;border-bottom: 31px solid #efebe9;border-right: 25px solid transparent;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)" data-style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: bottom; border-bottom: 31px solid rgb(239, 235, 233); border-right: 25px solid transparent;"} {#简单总结 tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px;margin-bottom: 15px;font-weight: bold;border-bottom: 3px solid rgb(0, 128, 255);font-size: 1.1em;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

### 算法任务 {#算法任务 tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px;margin-bottom: 15px;font-weight: bold;font-size: 20px;font-family: Calibri;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}

-   ::: {.section .js_darkmode__157 style="margin-top: 5px;margin-bottom: 5px;line-height: 26px;color: rgb(1, 1, 1);" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(1, 1, 1)" data-style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; line-height: 26px; color: rgb(1, 1, 1);"}
    构造一个预测函数来映射输入的特性矩阵和标签的线性关系。
    :::

-   ::: {.section .js_darkmode__158 style="margin-top: 5px;margin-bottom: 5px;line-height: 26px;color: rgb(1, 1, 1);" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(1, 1, 1)" data-style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; line-height: 26px; color: rgb(1, 1, 1);"}
    线性回归使用最佳的拟合直线（也就是回归线）在因变量（[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
    darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
    darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(1, 1, 1)"}）和一个或多个自变量（[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{style="cursor: pointer;"
    darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)"
    darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)|rgb(1, 1, 1)"}）之间建立一种关系。
    :::

在这种技术中，因变量是连续的，自变量可以是连续的也可以是离散的，回归线的性质是线性的。

### 优化目标 {#优化目标 tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px;margin-bottom: 15px;font-weight: bold;font-size: 20px;font-family: Calibri;" darkmode-color-16336956109062="rgb(163, 163, 163)" darkmode-original-color-16336956109062="#fff|rgb(0,0,0)"}
